class.name: MetaPlatformSDK_AdvancedAbuseReportOptions
class.brief_description: Represents advanced options for an abuse report.
class.description: Represents advanced options for an abuse report.

method.name: add_suggested_user
method.description: Provide a list of users to suggest for reporting. This list should include users that the reporter has recently interacted with to aid them in selecting the right user to report.

method.name: set_developer_defined_context_string
method.description: This field is intended to allow developers to pass custom metadata through the report flow. The metadata passed through is included with the report received by the developer.

method.name: set_object_type
method.description: If report_type is object/content, a string representing the type of content being reported. This should correspond to the object_type string used in the UI.

method.name: set_report_type
method.description: The intended entity being reported, whether user or object/content.

method.name: set_video_mode
method.description: The video mode controls whether or not the abuse report flow should collect evidence and whether it is optional or not. "Collect" requires video evidence to be provided by the user. "Optional" presents the user with the option to provide video evidence. "Skip" bypasses the video evidence collection step altogether.
